title: Shaheed Diwas: Nation remembers Bhagat Singh, Rajguru and Sukhdev on death anniversary
summary: Shaheed Diwas: The martyrdom day of Shaheed Bhagat Singh, Sukhdev and Rajguru is annually observed on March 23, the day on which in 1931, the three were hanged in the Lahore conspiracy case.

title: Eye on poll, Karnataka govt ups Lingayat, Vokkaliga quotas by 2% each
summary: In a major decision that is expected to significantly boost the BJP's prospects in the upcoming assembly elections, the state cabinet on Friday decided to increase the reservation quota for the two politically powerful and dominant castes - Lingayats and Vokkaligas - by 2% each. To increase the quota, the cabinet removed the 4% reservation for Muslims and moved them under the 10% Economically Weaker Section (EWS) basket.

title: Warning signs and symptoms of dangerously low potassium levels
summary: Low potassium levels can cause irregular heart rhythms, muscular weakness, and even paralysis. Here's all you want to know.

title: Separatist leader Amritpal Singh seen in jacket, trousers in fresh CCTV footage from Patiala
summary: As pro-Khalistan radical preacher Amritpal Singh remained elusive, a new CCTV footage emerged on Saturday purportedly showing him wearing a jacket and trousers and speaking on a mobile phone. There was no official word from police on the undated footage, which is circulating on social media and is said to be from Patiala.
